Class Appender¶

Abstract appender class.

Constructor¶

class Appender()¶

Methods¶

append¶

Appender#append(event)¶
Arguments:
  • event (Event) – The event to be appended to the log.

Appends a message to the log.

destroy¶

Appender#destroy()¶

Abstract method that needs to be implemented when an appender needs to clean up before it is destroyed.

rotate¶

Appender#rotate()¶

Abstract method that needs to be implemented when an appender needs to rename the file.
